Rosita owns and runs a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells various commodities ranging from canned goods, sugar, soft drinks, toiletries, biscuits, and beverages. She also engages in fish vending for additional income.  She lives in Dulag, Leyte.

She is asking for a loan in the amount of 20,000 PHP to buy more inventory for the store like condiments, canned goods, and other basic commodities. This will help improve the variety of merchandise in her store, attract more buyers, and therefore, increase her income and improve her finances.

Rosita hopes that she can manage both her businesses very well for the improvement of the family's living condition, and also continue to finance the schooling of her children for a brighter tomorrow.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as condiments, canned goods, and other basic commodities

loans.name: Maria Rojana

texts.es:
Maria tiene 22 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su hijo y cónyuge en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Lagunas, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como gallinas, patos, pavos, pollos, entre otros, desde hace más de 02 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con muy buenas referencias por parte de los pobladores de su distrito. El destino del préstamo es para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Maria espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes lo que mejorará su nivel de ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is 22 years old and lives with her husband and child in their own home. The community where they reside is known for trade, agriculture, and livestock breeding. It is located in the District of Lagunas in Chiclayo Province, which is part of the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

Maria raises and sells small animals such as hens, ducks, turkeys, chicks, and other livestock. She has been doing this for more than two years and has experience in this type of business. Maria has also received very good references from other residents in her district. Her loan will be used to buy a large quantity of animals so that she can increase the inventory of her business.

Maria hopes to offer a wider variety of animals to her customers so that she can improve her income level and also the quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of animals so that she can increase the inventory of her business.

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.en:
Antonieta is 44 years old, married, and has six children.  Antonieta works hard to provide for her family. 

Antonieta runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 16,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

She has been running the general store for 2 years, and also earns additional income from buying and selling dried fish and electronic mobile load retailing.

Antonieta has borrowed and paid 9 loans from NWTF before this loan. 

Antonieta aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Edulia

texts.en:
Edulia is 67 years old and widowed with nine children. Edulia works very hard to provide for them.

Edulia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items like beer, candies, noodles, detergent soap, shampoo, cereals, etc. to sell.

Edulia has been in this business for 20 years and sells a variety of items such as beer, candies, noodles, detergent soap, shampoo, cereals, etc. 

In the future, Edulia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like beer, candies, noodles, detergent soap, shampoo, and cereals to sell

loans.name: Anarkul

texts.ru: Анаркул 32 года, замужем, мать 4 детей школьного и дошкольного возраста. Супруг и дети активно помогают по хозяйству. У Анаркул среднее образование. В качестве дополнительного источника доходов для семьи, она занимается животноводством, начав бизнес в 2002 году. Хозяйство на сегодня приносит в среднем 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. На данный момент в хозяйстве Анаркул имеется 3 коровы, 4 овцы и 2 лошади. На 1,0 Га земли она выращивает картофель и кукурузу. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 110,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en:
Anarkul is 32 years old, married and the mother of four children of school and pre-school age. Her husband and children actively help her with her business. Anarkul has secondary education. 

As an additional income for her family, she works with livestock breeding, after having started this business in 2002. Her business currently brings in 15,000 som (KGS) per month on average. Currently Anarkul has three cows, four sheep and two horses on her farm. She grows potatoes and sweet corn on 1.0 hectares of land.

With an aim to further develop her business, she turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 110,000 som (KGS) to purchase calves. She plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing the number of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase calves in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Aza

texts.ru: Аза, 42 года, замужем, мать 3 детей. У Азы высшее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается сельским хозяйством. Благодаря упорному труду Азы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 0,30 ГА собственной земли, где она с супругом выращивает кукурузу. У нее есть 9 коров, 20 овец и лошадь. Ежемесячный доход составляет в среднем 12,000 сом (KGS). Аза обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита Аза планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Aza is 42 years old, married and the mother of three children. Aza has higher education. As a main source of income for her family, she works with agriculture. 

Thanks to Aza's persistent work, her farm currently has 0.30 hectares of own land, where she and her husband grow sweet corn. She also has nine cows, 20 sheep and a horse. The monthly income is 12,000 som (KGS) on average. 

Aza turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to purchase bull-calves to fatten and resell. Aza plans to invest the income from the loan in further developing her business.

loans.use: to buy bull-calves for fattening and reselling

loans.name: Francis's Group

texts.en:
Francis is a 49-year-old proud father of five children. He is a group leader, often described as a very reliable person, and is representing his group of 10 farmers in Butere District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2014, Francis has noticed that he has been able to consistently feed his family.

Francis described his harvest as good last year, but believes he can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. He is very excited to also be purchasing two solar lights, apart from fertilizer and maize, because he will now be able to have light during dark hours for his children to be able to study. With the profits from this season’s harvest, he plans to send her children to school.

With this loan, Francis’ Group will be able to plant a total of six acres of land and purchase a total of 13 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase two solar lights and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Jovita

texts.en:
Jovita, who is married, works hard to support her family. She has been buying and selling dried coconut meat in the Philippines for 11 years now.

Jovita has requested a PHP 14000 loan through NWTF to buy more sacks of dried coconut meat to sell. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of dried coconut meat to sell

loans.name: Miranda

texts.en:
Although divorced, 38-year-old Miranda still lives with her ex-husband and their two children in the same house in the city of Korca. She works with the international organization, ‘Help for Children,’ whereas her ex-husband transports goods for wholesale buyers. 

Miranda is requesting this loan to start up a business. Her ex-husband owns a little property in the suburbs of the city where Miranda plans on building a  room where she can store recycling materials such as plastic and metals. 

“There are plenty of such materials everywhere in Albania. In most cases, the Egyptian and Roma communities have been doing this for years. Seeing how they’ve done it, I thought that would be a good activity for us as well. If we have the storage room and the money to buy the scrap, it will be okay. We will then sell the scrap,” said Miranda.

loans.use: to pay for scrap plastic and metal to sell and to build a storage room

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy basic grains, snacks, eggs, bread and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more assorted soap from the market and sell these products to her customers

loans.name: Irma Ofelia

texts.es:
Irma Ofelia es una mujer de 55 años de edad está unida con su esposo con el que tiene una hija de  28 años que ya trabaja y ayuda  a sus padres, esta linda familia vive en una comunidad de Suchitepéquez.
Irma Ofelia para obtener sus ingresos y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa trabaja como empleada doméstica en una casa particular, ella tiene 25 años de realizar esta labor gracias a esta actividad ha logrado mantener a su familia.
Irma Ofelia es una madre que se preocupa por las necesidades de su linda familia y ahora se ha dado cuenta que una de las más necesarias es la construcción de un corredor para su casa, pues hasta en estos días han sufrido  porque el sol pega mucho en la pared de la casa y ahora que ya se acerca la época de lluvia le preocupa que por no tener un corredor pueda el agua entrar, pero una de las dificultades que ella tiene es que no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para la construcción por tal motivo solicita un crédito que lo utilizara pata comprar, cemento, cal, arena hierro.

El gran sueño de Irma Ofelia es poder contar con este crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y algún día poder instalar una tienda de compra y venta de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Irma Ofelia is a 55 year old woman who lives with her husband. She has a 28 year old daughter who works and helps her parents. This beautiful family lives in the community of Suchitepéquez.

In order to obtain her own income and help her husband with the household expenses, Irma Ofelia works as a domestic employee in a private home. She has been doing this work for 25 years and thanks to it she has been able to support her family.  

Irma Ofelia is a mother who worries about the needs of her beautiful family and now she has realized that one of the most necessary things is the construction of a corridor for the side of her house. She has suffered lately because the sun hits the side of the house very strongly and now that the rainy season is coming, she is worried about not having a side corridor to avoid the rain coming in. One of the difficulties she has is that she doesn't have enough money to build with and that is why she is asking for a loan to buy cement, lime, sand and iron.

Irma Ofelia's big dream is to have this loan and improve her family's quality of life and some day be able to open a store to buy and sell groceries.

loans.use: to buy cement, lime, sand and iron to build a corridor.

loans.name: Otinkorang Group

texts.en: These members are part of one of the traditional groups in the Teshie branch, called 'Otinkorang'. They are on their ninth cycle with ID-Ghana. The group is composed of two members. The businesses that the members of this group are involved in does vary. They include selling vegetables, second hand clothing and underwear. The loan they are requesting will be useful to a small micro entrepreneur like Joyce. She has been working with ID-Ghana for her ninth loan cycle, entering at the invitation of her friend who is also a member of the institution. Today, she has a business selling vegetables (onion, fresh and tinned tomatoes), cooking oil, towels and bed sheets. This loan will bring an increase of working capital that she will use towards expanding her business. She will buy more vegetables (onion, fresh and tinned tomatoes), cooking oil, towels and bed sheets and sell these products to her customers. This business allows her to generate resources in order to maintain her home for her husband and two children.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables (onion, fresh and tinned tomatoes), cooking oil, towels and bed sheets and sell these products to her customers.

loans.name: Kitende School

texts.en:
Greetings from Uganda! This is Charles. He is the Director of Kitende Standard Primary School, a mixed school in the rural area of Kitende in Wakiso with 280 students. Kitende School has requested a loan to cover the cost of installing and maintaining a UV water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students. The school does not currently have access to consistent clean drinking water and therefore has to spend a considerable portion of its budget on firewood, which is used to boil water for the children. Installing a water filtration system will, therefore, save the school money in the long term as the cost of firewood will be reduced. The loan will enable the school to purchase a UV water treatment system with a 450 litre tank, which will be big enough to store clean drinking water for the students every day. 

Kitende School will repay their loan from their school fees, which they collect each term. Charles ultimately hopes that having access to safe drinking water will improve his students’ concentration and attendance by reducing the number of children that fall sick from water-borne diseases as well as increase the number of students coming to the school.

loans.use: To purchase a water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students.

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon is a native of Dulag, Leyte. She earns a living by raising and selling hogs.  She is a married woman with three dependents. Her oldest is 19 and the youngest is 12. It has been five years now that she has been engaged in the hog raising business.

She has requested a loan to purchase piglets.  This will increase the quantity of hogs she raises and enable her to improve her earnings in a few months. Slowly, her hog raising livelihood will increase her earnings and she can start to expand her current sources of income. Thus, she can provide healthy diets and better living conditions.

Corazon will do her best to support the needs of her growing children and provide a sustainable livelihood in the future.

loans.use: to purchase piglets

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
Pedro, de 45 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está acompañado y su pareja trabaja en los oficios domésticos, tiene 3 hijos, que viven en casa y estudian.

Pedro, trabaja con ganado de repasto desde hace 15 años, lo aprendió de su padre y decidió continuar con esta actividad para obtener ingresos para cubrir las necesidades de su familia; también trabaja la agricultura y se dedica a la elaboración de carretas.

Pedro, necesita el crédito para comprar ganado de repasto bovino, con esto incrementará su negocio con ganado y esto le permitirá tener más ganancias.

Sus sueños son, seguir trabajando con ganado y llegar a ser un gran ganadero, para poder ofrecerles un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Pedro is 45 years old.  He studied until the sixth grade.  He is in a relationship and his partner takes care of household duties.  He has three children, who live with them and go to school.  

Pedro has worked with grazing cattle for 15 years.  He learned it from his father and decided to continue in this occupation in order to earn income to meet the needs of his family.  He also works in agriculture and makes carts.  

Pedro needs a loan to purchase grazing cattle.  This will increase his business with cattle and will allow him to make a greater profit.  His dreams are to continue working with cattle and to become a great livestock farmer in order to be able to offer his children a better future.

loans.use: to purchase grazing cattle.

loans.name: Gemima Beatriz

texts.es:
Gemima, de 21 años de edad, es estudiante, estudio hasta séptimo grado, debido a la situacion económica, no pudo continuar estudiando, está soltera y no tiene hijos, vive con su madre la cual depende económicamente de ella.

Gemima, se dedica a la venta de especies menores desde hace siete años, trabajo que aprendió de sus padres, además trabaja con hortalizas; la parcela donde trabaja está a una distancia de tres kilómetros de su casa y el recorrido lo realiza caminando y su horario de trabajo comienza a las 7:00 a.m. y regresa a las 4:00 p.m.

Gemima, está solicitando el crédito en CREDICAMPO para comprar cerdos de engorde, ella espera poder tener ganancias a futuro para mejorar su calidad de vida y así poder pagar su crédito sin problema.

Gemima, sueña con poder construir su propia casa, porque en la que vive no es propia; además, sueña con poder ampliar su crianza de cerdos y lograr tener más ingresos para su alimentación y la de su madre.
texts.en:
Gemima, 21 years old, is a student. She has studied up to seventh grade, but due to an financial situation, she could no longer continue studying. She is single and has no children, and she lives with her mother who is financially dependent on her.  

She has made a living selling small animals for seven years. She learned the work from her parents, but she also works with vegetables. The plot of land where she works is three kilometers from her house, and she walks the route. Her work begins at 7:00 am, and she returns at 4:00 pm. 

Gemima is asking for a loan from CrediCampo in order to buy pigs to fatten. She hopes to be able to make a profit in the future in order to improve her quality of life and be able to pay back her loan without any issues.  

She dreams of being able to build her own home because the house in which she lives now is not hers. She also dreams of being able to expand her breeding of pigs and earn more revenue to feed herself and her mother.

loans.use: to buy pigs to fatten.

loans.name: Nhóm 35 - Bình Xuyên Group

texts.en: Mrs. Hue, pictured first from the left, is a 43-year-old farmer who makes a monthly income of about $25. She has been a member of the local Women's Union since 2000. Her husband died due to a serious illness. Now she has to raise a disabled child alone.  Her family is classified as a poor family. Due to economic hardship, her family has not yet been able to build a septic tank latrine and is currently using a double-pit latrine which is now degraded. With this loan, Hue will build a sanitary toilet in her house which will improve the living conditions for the family members by preventing diseases commonly associated with unhygienic toilets while contributing to the environmental health of the community.

loans.use: to pay for the construction of a hygienic toilet and a hand-washing device with soap

loans.name: Nhóm 36 - Bình Xuyên Group

texts.en: Tu, 47, works in agricultural production with a monthly income of nearly $35. She is married with two grown children but they are currently unemployed. She has been a member of the Women's Union since 1998. She has become the bread winner of the family since her husband has had an intellectual disability for years. She spends the most money on her husband's treatment. Due to economic hardship, her family has not yet been able to build a septic tank latrine and is currently using a double-pit latrine which has now degraded. With a portion of this loan, she will be able to gain access to latrine hardware facilities, which include a hygienic septic tank latrine and a handwashing device with soap. Those facilities will also help her family improve their health, living conditions, and personal safety, in addition to providing convenience, cleanliness, and privacy for all family members, while contributing to the environmental health of the community. In the picture, Tu is the first from the left.

loans.use: to pay for the construction of a hygienic toilet and a handwashing device with soap.

loans.name: Las Praderas De Pariachi Group

texts.es: Esta es la  nueva Alcancía “Las Praderas De Pariachi” La cual  está constituida por 08 socios con muchas ganas de empezar a  trabajar y prosperar. Tamara de 22 años de edad es casada con 01 hijo de un año de edad. Ella se dedica  a la venta de cosméticos de belleza. Hace 7 meses que se desempeña en dicho negocio.  Su mayor deseo es poder tener su peluquería. Solicitó el crédito para la compra de labiales, perfumes y colonias. La Nueva Alcancía “Las Praderas de Pariachi” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por facilitarles este crédito. Tamara se encuentra sentada y es la segunda del lado derecho y viste polo color rosado lleva en su regazo a su hijo.
texts.en: This is the new “Las Praderas De Pariachi” group which is made up of 8 members who are eager to start working and prosper. Tamara, 22, is married and has a 1-year-old child. She makes a living selling beauty products. She has been working in said business for 7 months. Her greatest desire is to have a beauty salon. She is requesting a loan to buy lipstick, perfume, and cologne. The new “Las Praderas de Pariachi” group is grateful to Kiva lenders for providing this loan. In the photo, Tamara is the second one from the right who is sitting and wearing a pink shirt and has her child on her lap.

loans.use: to buy lipstick, perfume, and cologne.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: purchase fabric for manufacturing clothes to sell.

loans.name: Xuyen

texts.en:
Xuyen would like to take an additional loan to buy rice, raw foods and spices to make meals to sell from her stall. 

Xuyen's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers, and increase sales. 

She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a variety of different foods to make meals to serve her customers.

loans.name: Xuan

texts.en:
Xuan would like to take an additional loan to purchase equipment and ingredients to make bread for selling. 

Her previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers, and increase sales. 

She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy equipment and ingredients to make bread.

loans.name: Klodet

texts.en:
Klodet is a single man in his late 20s. He lives in a village not far from a picturesque place that is visited by hundreds of people every year. Kindly note the villagers here make a very tasty wine that they export to neighbor countries. 

Recently, Klodet started running a bar café in his village and wants to use the loan that he is requesting from you to do some repairs and buy chairs, tables and some kitchen equipment.  The activity that he has been practicing for a long time is agriculture; he has been given the okay from his grandparents to use their agricultural land to his advantage. Klodet plants mainly wheat, beans and fodder and also has grapevines and apple orchards. He sells the products to wholesale buyers.

loans.use: to furnish his bar cafe and do some repairs to it

loans.name: Ghulam  Fatima

texts.en: Ghulam Fatima is 37 years old and married. She is running a business selling milk with her husband. She has buffaloes and cows for milk production. Her husband sells the milk in nearby areas.  Her job is to look after the buffaloes and collect the milk from them. Together, both husband and wife are supporting their family. However, they need to earn more income for their everyday expenditures. Therefore, she has requested 45,000 PKR to buy one more buffalo to cater to more customers to provide a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to buy one more buffalo to cater to more customers and provide a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fertilizer to treat her coffee crops.

loans.name: Farida's Group

texts.en:
Farida, pictured above, has five children and is always described as a very hardworking individual, which is why she was selected to become the group leader of her group. Farida is representing her group of 11 farmers in Butere District and is happy to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

Farida has been a farmer for 15 years and, in order to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods, she decided to join the One Acre Fund program this season. Her loan will not only include farming inputs but also a solar light, which she is very happy to be getting as that means she will now reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. 

With the profits from this coming season, Farida is planning to send her children to school.

A total of 5.5 acres will be planted by Farida's Group, and between them they will receive a total of 3 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Saima

texts.en:
Saima is 23 years old; she is a married woman.  She deals in a business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. 

She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of PKR 45,000  to purchase more animals to increase her sales. 

She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to increase her sales.

loans.name: Bakhsai

texts.en:
Bakhsai  is a 47-year-old married woman. The man shown in the photo is Bakhsai’s husband, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Bakhsai  has applied for a loan of 45,000 PKR, for her husband. He wants to buy new tires and some auto spare parts for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. 

Bakhsai  is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires and some auto spare parts

loans.name: Nhóm 33 - Bình Xuyên Group

texts.en: Thoi is 32 years old and works in agricultural production with a monthly income of approximately $36. Thoi and her husband are now living in a house with their three small children and old parents. She has been a member of the Women's Union since 2005. Thoi is fully aware of the fact that using a degraded double-pit latrine has the risk of potential adverse effects on the health of her family members, her community and environmental contamination. However, she has not yet been able to construct a septic tank latrine due to a shortage of funds. With her portion of this loan, she will be able to buy materials to build a hygienic septic tank latrine and a hand-washing device with soap. Those facilities will help her family improve their health and living conditions, while affording safety for them. In addition, this will provide convenience, cleanliness and privacy for all family members, while contributing to the environmental protection of the community. In the picture, Thoi is pictured in a white shirt, first from the right.

loans.use: to pay for the construction of a hygienic toilet and a hand washing device with soap.

loans.name: Progressive School

texts.en:
Greetings from Uganda! This is Peter. He is the head teacher of the Progressive Secondary School, a mixed school in the urban area of Kitintale in Kampala with 700 students. Progressive Secondary School has requested a loan to cover the cost of installing and maintaining a UV water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students. The school does not currently have access to consistent clean drinking water and, therefore, has to spend a considerable portion of its budget on firewood, which is used to boil water for the children. Installing a water filtration system will therefore save the school money in the long term, as the cost of firewood will be reduced. The loan will enable the school to purchase a UV water treatment system with a 750 litre tank, which will be big enough to store clean drinking water for the students every day. 

Progressive Secondary School will repay their loan from their school fees, which they collect each term. Peter ultimately hopes that having access to safe drinking water will improve his student’s concentration and attendance by reducing the number of children that fall sick from water-borne diseases as well as increase the number of students coming to the school.

loans.use: To purchase a water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy makeup and hair products for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Edith

texts.en: Edith is single with four children, two of whom are in school. She takes care of additional family members. She operates a retail shop from home and sells her products on a retail basis. She works seven days a week and has been in this business for seven years. She gets additional income from poultry farming. She has applied for a loan of UGX 2,000,000 from MCDT-SACCO to buy cooking oil, rice, maize flour, soap, flour, beans and bags of sugar. Her major business challenges include seasonality and transportation. She is aspiring to build rental houses. She lives in her own house where her family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include paying school fees and food.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, rice, maize flour, and soap

loans.name: Abdurrahman's Group

texts.en:
Abdurrahman is a 47-year-old proud father of eight children. He is a group leader, often described as a very reliable person, and is representing his group of seven farmers in Butere District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2013, Abdurrahman has noticed that he has been able to consistently feed his family.

Abdurrahman described his harvest as good last year, but believes he can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. He is very excited to be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because he will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits from this season’s harvest, he plans to rent more land to cultivate.

With this loan, Abdurrahman’s Group will be able to plant a total of 5.25 acres of land and purchase a total of five solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Huong

texts.en:
Huong, 56, is married and has two children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband is a worker at a factory in the local community. She earns an income running a shop selling beverages and sweet soup. 

She started this business 10 years ago. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying new furniture for her shop in order to attract more customers.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy new furniture for her shop.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is married with two children, one of whom goes to school. She also takes care of additional family members. She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity, but does not have access to piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and rent. 

Grace operates a boutique and has been in this business for seven years. She works seven days a week and sells on a retail basis. Her major business challenges include the seasonality of clothes. She has applied for a loan of 1,300,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more bales of used clothes. She aspires to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy a bale of used clothes.

loans.name: Umay  Laila

texts.en:
Umay Laila is a 37-year-old married woman who has been running a school for four years. She knows the value of hard work. She had the desire to educate deserving children in her community, and her experience in running a school has given her the expertise. 

After several years of hard work, today there are 126 students in her school, half of whom are girls. She requires a loan of 80,000 PKR. Umay Laila wants to improve the school's environment by buying chairs and desks for students and fans for the classrooms. She also wants to buy a computer so that her students can practice the skills they need to succeed in today's world.

loans.use: to improve the school's environment by buying chairs and desks for students, fans for the classroom, and a computer.

loans.name: Razia

texts.en: Razia is 43 years old and married with seven children. She has been providing services of flour grinding in her community to contribute to her family's income. She knows very well the techniques of grinding and has much experience in this work. By this time, she has become famous for providing fine quality flour and earns enough to support the needs of her family members. In order to purchase a new grinding machine, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000. It will help her to cater to more customers time after time, which will ultimately help to generate more cash. She wishes to spend part of the profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to purchase a new grinding machine to cater to more customers time after time, which will ultimately help in generating more cash.

loans.name: Mukhtaran

texts.en:
Mukhtaran has successfully built her business of a general store with the support of Kiva and Kashf Foundation. Over time, she has become popular in her community for providing good-quality products and makes enough to meet the expenses of her two children. Previously, with the help of a Kiva loan, she was able to expand her business.

Now she requested a loan of 45,000 PKR to purchase more grocery items, including grains, peas, flour, sugar and tea, to cater to the maximum number of customers for generating a healthier source of income.

She is positive about her future earnings and will spend part of her income on buying more items for her store.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items, including grains, peas, flour, sugar and tea, to cater to the maximum number of customers for generating a healthier source of income.

loans.name: Safia

texts.en:
Safia is a 33-year-old married woman and the mother of three children. She is a hardworking mother who is helping her family by providing the service of tailoring to her community. She has been doing it for many years, and Safia knows the techniques of stitching very well. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns enough to lead a decent life. 

To help her continue the operations of her business, Safia has requested a loan of 60,000 PKR  to buy stitching materials such as spools of thread in different colors, and packs of zippers and buttons etc. This will help her to sew more dresses on time. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenue to deal with her personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy stitching materials.

loans.name: Zeenat

texts.en:
Zeenat is a 50-year-old married woman. She is in the business of animal purchase and sale, and does so with the help of her husband, who is also shown in the photo. Zeenat is also involved in selling milk to generate an extra amount of income. 

Her business has provided her family with a decent life. She is very motivated to provide them with a beautiful life with good food, health and clothing. Zeenat has accessed a Murabaha loan of 35,000 PKR. It will allow her to purchase another cow to generate greater revenue in the future.

loans.use: to purchase another cow and generate greater revenue in the future.

loans.name: Miliseti's Group

texts.en:
Miliseti, pictured above, has five children and is always described as a very friendly person, which is why she was selected to become the group leader of her group. Miliseti is representing a group of 10 farmers in Butere District and is happy to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

Miliseti has been a farmer for 15 years and, in order to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods, she decided to join the One Acre Fund program this season. Her loan will not only include farming inputs but also a solar light, which she is very happy to be getting as it means she will now reduce her consumption of paraffin fuel, therefore saving more money. With the profits from this coming season, Miliseti is planning to send her children to school.

A total of 4.5 acres will be planted by Miliseti's Group, and between them they will receive a total of eight solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Carlos Agusto

texts.es:
El señor Carlos  de 50 años de edad es casado tiene casa propia y se dedica a la compra y venta de combustible su negocio está ubicado en el municipio  de Amapala donde radica, sus clientes son todas las personas que cuentan con lanchas pesqueras, y de pasajeros, y moto taxis, es una persona muy luchadora ya que también vende agua  de forma ambulante, está muy contento por el apoyo que ha recibido de Prisma,  radica en el municipio de Amapala al sur de Honduras.
 Don Carlos solicita 9,000 lempiras para compra de de gasolina regular y súper para la venta, y con el apoyo de este préstamo espera invertirlo y mejorar mas sus ingresos y aprovechar la época de semana santa.
Don Carlos su sueño es que su hija se gradué de la universidad y que tenga un futuro prometedor.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo del 2015.
texts.en:
Carlos, 50 years old is married. He has his own house and he works buying and selling gas. His business is located in the municipality of Ampala where he's located. His customers are all people who have fishing boats, passenger boats and moto taxis. He is a very tenacious person who also sells water on foot. He's very content because of the support he's received from Prisma. He's located in the municipality of Amapala, in southern Honduras.

Carlos is applying for 9,000 lempiras to buy regular and super gasoline for selling. With the support of this loan, he hopes to invest it and improve his income more and take advantage of the Holy Week season.

Carlos' dream is that his daughter will graduate from the university and that she has a promising future.

loans.use: to buy gas for selling.

loans.name: Sonia Maribel

texts.es:
Sonia, de 51 años de edad, es ama de casa, su nivel de estudio fue hasta noveno grado, decidió ayudarle a sus padres a trabajar para apoyarles económicamente, está casada y junto con su esposo tiene 3 hijos de 30, 29 y 24 años de edad, ella vive solo con su hija menor y una nieta, las cuales dependen económicamente de ella y su esposo se dedica trabajar de motorista.

Sonia, se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y en tiempo de cosecha de mango y aguacate se dedica a venderlos, en los alrededores de la comunidad, esto lo realiza desde hace 10 años, este trabajo decidió hacerlo para ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos y así tener una mejor alimentación.

Sonia, está solicitando el crédito para comprar 2 vacas de repasto, ella espera poderlas vender durante el periodo que termina el crédito, lo que ayudara a tener mejores ingresos y ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos del hogar y a tener una mejor calidad de vida.

Sonia, sueña con poder ampliar su vivienda en el futuro, comprar un terreno y reparar su vehículo, porque está deteriorado.
texts.en:
Sonia is 51 years old. She is a housewife. She completed ninth grade.She decided to help her parents by working to support them economically. She is married. Sonia and her husband have three children who are 30, 29 and 24 years old.  She live with her youngest daughter and a granddaughter. They depend on her economically and her husband works with motorcycles. 

Sonia is dedicated to household duties. During mango and avocado harvests, she sells these fruits on the outskirts of her community. She started doing this 10 years ago. She decided to do this work to help her husband with the household expenses and to have access to better food. 

Sonia is requesting a loan to purchase two grazing cows. She hopes to sell them during the time when the loan ends. This will help her to have better earnings, to help her husband with the household expenses and to have a better quality of life. 

Sonia dreams about being able to expand her home in the future, purchase land and repair her vehicle because it is deteriorating.

loans.use: purchase two grazing cows.

loans.name: Atonia

texts.en:
Atonia is aged 42, married, with four children, living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She trades in cocoa, mainly buying and selling in markets and gets additional income from her own cocoa garden. She started the business to raise income for the family and school fees for the children.

Her main challenge is limited capital to stock as much cocoa as she can to sell. She hopes to expand the business, educate children and support the family in getting basic needs. 

Atonia has asked for a loan to buy more cocoa to sell.

loans.use: To buy more cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Hoanh's Group

texts.en:
Hoanh is 59 years old and lives with her son and daughter and her husband. For the past 10 years Hoanh has been running a food stall to support her family. She is the Group Leader of a 4-member loan group that live in Ho Chi Minh City. In the picture she is in the third from left wearing a red top. Each of the other group members are requesting loans to fund income-generating activities. 

Hoanh is requesting a loan to purchase noodles and raw food to cook at her stall. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and attract new ones. She also hopes that through her loan she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties facing her family.

loans.use: To buy noodles and raw food to cook food at her stall.

loans.name: Jose Roberto

texts.es:
José,de 23 años de edad, de profesión agricultor, estudió hasta cuarto grado, debido a la situacion económica en que vivían sus padres no le permitieron continuar sus estudios, está soltero y vive con su tía, la cual depende de él, su tía se dedica a la venta de frutas como manzanas, uvas, guineos, fresas, naranjas, etc.

Roberto, se dedica a la agricultura, la ganadería, al cultivo de hortalizas y en el verano se dedica a cortar caña desde hace 10 años; este trabajo lo aprendió por la necesidad de darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, para llegar a su trabajo José, camina un kilómetro y su horario de trabajo comienza a las 6:00 a.m. y sale a las 4:00 p.m. 

Roberto, está solicitando el crédito en la institución para comprar dos toretes, para trabajar con ellos en tiempo de la agricultura, esto ayudará a tener más ingresos económicos para él.

Roberto, sueña con mejorar su calidad de vida y poder ahorrar para construir su propia vivienda, porque en la que vive no es propia y no está en buenas condiciones.
texts.en:
José Roberto, 23, works in agriculture. He studied up until 4th grade due to his parents' financial situation, which didn't allow him to continue his studies. He is single and lives with his aunt, who is dependent on him. His aunt sells fruit such as apples, grapes, bananas, strawberries, oranges, etc.

José Roberto works in agriculture, animal husbandry, and grows vegetables. He has been cutting sugarcane in the summer for 10 years. He learned this job out of the necessity to give his family a better quality of life. To arrive at his job, José Roberto walks 1 kilometer and he works from 6:00 a.m. until 4:00 p.m.

José Roberto is requesting a loan to buy 2 steers to work with them during farming time. This will help him to earn more income. José Roberto dreams of improving his quality of life and to be able to save to build his own house since he doesn't own the one he lives in and it's not in good condition.

loans.use: to buy 2 steers.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha, de 42 años de edad, es ama de casa y su nivel de estudio fue hasta primer grado, sus padres no pudieron ayudarle para que continuara estudiando porque su situación económica era escaza, pues solo ganaban para la alimentación diaria; ella decidió aprender a trabajar, para poder ayudarle a su familia en los gastos de la casa, está casada y tiene 2 hijos de 11 y un año de edad, de los cuales solo uno se encuentra estudiando en el centro educativo de la comunidad y su esposo se dedica a la corta de caña desde hace varios años.

Martha, se dedica a la corta de caña desde hace cinco años, este trabajo lo aprendió con su esposo para mejorar su situación económica, para llegar a su trabajo Martha, camina 5 kilómetros y su horario de trabajo es de 5:00 a.m. y regresa a casa a las 11:00 a.m. a realizar sus quehaceres.

Martha, está solicitando el crédito para comprar laminas para construir un corredor en su vivienda.

Martha, sueña con poder ayudarles económicamente a sus hijos, para que estudien una carrera universitaria y sean profesionales y tengan mejores posibilidades.
texts.en:
Martha, 42 years old, is a homemaker and her level of study was up to first grade. Her parents couldn't help her continue studying because their economic situation was scarce. They only earned the daily food; she decided to learn to work to be able to help her family with the expenses of the house. She is married and has two children - 11 and one year old, of which only one is studying in the community education center. Her husband has worked cutting sugarcane for several years.

Martha has worked cutting sugarcane for the past five years. She learned this work with her husband to improve her economic situation. To arrive to her job Martha walks 5 kilometers and her work schedule is from 5:00 AM. She returns to house at 11:00 AM to do her chores.

Martha is applying for a loan to buy laminate to construct a hallway in her home.

Martha dreams of being able to help her children economically, so that they can study a university degree and be professionals and have better possibilities.

loans.use: to buy laminate to construct a hallway in her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn and firewood to make tortillas.

loans.name: Shameem

texts.en:
Shameem is a 49-year-old married woman, and has three children. The man shown in the photo is Shameem’s husband.  He has been running a nursery business (flowers and plants) for many years. 

For the growth of her husband’s business, Shameem has requested a loan from Murabaha of 30,000 PKR. It allowed her husband to purchase more seeds of different flowers along with new plants and pots. He wishes to use part of the revenues on the expansion of his business and wishes to spend part of the income on the betterment of his family members.

loans.use: to purchase more seeds of different flowers along with new plants and pots.

loans.name: Reina Elizabeth

texts.es: Reina de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hermana, ella se dedica a la venta de tortas de jamón y carne, tiene 13 años de experiencia y su negocio está ubicado en el mercado central que esta cerca de su casa, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de materia prima como pan, carne, jamón, mayonesa, etc. todo por mayor y así tener mejores ingresos económicos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Reina, 34 years old, lives in her own house with her sister. She works selling ham and beef sandwiches. She has 13 years' experience and her business is located in the central market that's near her house. She is applying for a loan to purchase prime materials like bread, meat, ham, mayonnaise, etc. all in bulk and therefore have better economic income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy prime materials like bread, meat, jam, mayonnaise, etc. all in bulk.

loans.name: Claudia Roxana

texts.es:
Claudia, de 26 años de edad, es ama de casa, estudio hasta quinto grado, está acompañada y junto con su pareja tienen 3 hijos de 11, 6 y 2 años de edad, de los cuales dos se encuentran estudiando en el centro educativo de la comunidad, su esposo se dedica a trabajar en la corta de caña de azúcar y en el invierno se dedica a la agricultura, la ganadería y a la siembra de hortalizas.

Claudia, se dedica a la crianza de especies menores tales como pollos y cerdos de engorde desde hace 3 años, este trabajo lo aprendió de sus padres y para ayudar en los gastos del hogar, para llegar a su trabajo Claudia, camina 3 kilómetros y su horario es de 7:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m. todos los días.

Claudia, está solicitando el crédito en CREDICAMPO, para comprar dos vacas lecheras y 4 cerdos de engorde, así mejorará su negocio y también mejorarán sus ingresos, con el cual ella podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y mejor alimentación.
 
Claudia, sueña con poder mejorar y ampliar su vivienda, para poder tener más espacio para su negocio de especies menores, también sueña con ayudarle a sus hijos económicamente para que puedan tener estudiar una carrera universitaria y que en el futuro sean personas de bien y puedan tener mejores posibilidades de trabajo.
texts.en:
Claudia, 26, is a homemaker. She has a 5th grade education. She is married and she and her partner have three children ages 11, 6, and 2. Two of them are studying at the school in the community. Her husband cuts sugarcane and in the winter he works in agriculture, animal husbandry, and he grows vegetables.

Claudia has been raising small animals such as chickens and pigs for fattening for 3 years. She learned this job from her parents so she could help with the household expenses. To arrive at her job, Claudia walks 3 kilometers and she works from 7:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. every day.

Claudia is requesting a loan from Credicampo to buy 2 dairy cows and 4 pigs for fattening. That way, she will improve her business and also her income with which she will give her family a better quality of life and better food.

Claudia dreams of improving and expanding her house in order to have more space for her small animals business. She also dreams of helping her children financially so they can have a college education and so that in the future, they can be good people and have better job prospects.

loans.use: to buy 2 dairy cows and 4 pigs for fattening.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana, de 69 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de poder estudiar debido a la situacion económica de sus padres, decidieron enseñarle a trabajar para que les pudiera ayudar en los gastos de la casa, es madre soltera de 5 hijos, todos ya son mayores de edad y están casados y trabajan para sus familias; su esposo falleció hace algunos años y en su casa vive una nieta y 2 bisnietos.

Juana, se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, no trabaja ya que tiene una pensión que le pasan mensualmente para cubrir sus necesidades, anteriormente trabajaba con su compañero de vida en la agricultura y en el destazo de cerdos.

Juana, está solicitando el crédito para comprar materiales de construcción como ladrillos, piedra y cemento para ampliar un poco más su vivienda, esto le permitirá tener una mejor comodidad en su hogar.

Juana, sueña con poder mejorar aún más su vivienda y para darle una mejor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Juana, 69, didn't have the opportunity to study due to the economic situation of her parents. They decided to teach her to work so that she could help them with the expenses of the house. She is a single mother of 5 children, they are all already of age and married and work for their families; her husband passed away some years ago. In her house live a niece and two grand nephews.

Juana dedicates herself to the chores of the home. She doesn't work anymore because she has a pension which is passed to her monthly to cover her necessities. Previously, she worked with her life partner in agriculture and in pork butchering.

Juana is applying for a loan to buy construction materials like bricks, stones and cement to make her home a little larger. This will permit her to have more comfort in her home.

Juana dreams of being able to improve her home even more to give her family more comfort.

loans.use: to buy construction materials like bricks, stones and cement to make her home a little larger.

loans.name: Mateo

texts.es:
Mateo es un joven de 20 años de edad, es un joven muy amable y responsable  vive junto a sus padres en una comunidad de Chichicastenango.
Mateo para obtener sus ingresos y apoyar a sus padres con los ingresos de la casa se dedica a la agricultura él tiene 6 años de realizar esta labor.
Este muchacho es muy optimista  que desde hace algún tiempo había pensado en remolar la casa, porque con el paso de los años la casa se ha ido deteriorando, a pesar de sus esfuerzos no ha logrado hacer su sueño realidad, por tal motivo de solicita un crédito que lo utilizara para comprar, cemento, cal arena, block y hierro.
El gran sueño de Mateo es poder construir su propia casa para cuando decida formar una familia tenga que ofrecerles.
texts.en:
Mateo is a young man of 20. He is a very friendly and responsible young man who lives with his parents in a community of Chichicastenango. To obtain his income and support his parents with the expenses of the house, Mateo works in agriculture. He has been doing this work for 6 years. This guy is very optimistic that since a while ago he's been thinking of remodeling the house. With the passage of the years, the house has been deteriorating. Despite his efforts, he hasn't achieved making his dream a reality. For that reason, he's applying for a loan that he will use to buy cement, lime, sand, cinderblock and iron. 

Mateo's great dream is to be able to construct his own house for when he decides to form a family, he has something to offer them.

loans.use: to buy cement, lime, sand, cinderblock and iron to remodel his house.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en: Josephine is married and has three children, all of whom go to school. She has no additional family members. She sells used clothes at the market and has been in this business for 12 years. She has applied for a loan of UGX 1,300,000 from MCDT SACCO to buy bales of used clothes. She works in her shop six days a week and sells on a retail basis. Her major business challenge includes the seasonality of used clothes. She would like to start selling used bags and shoes to increase her sales. She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: to buy bales of used clothes

loans.name: Mujeres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es: Este es el nuevo grupo “Mujeres trabajadoras” y está conformada por 06 mujeres trabajadoras dispuestas a comenzar a trabajar honradamente. Yolanda de 43 años  es viuda y tiene 4 hijos 1 de ellos dependiente, actualmente ella se dedica a la venta de comidas. Hace más de 7 años que ella se viene dedicando a dicho negocio el cual le va bien, ya que con mucho esfuerzo trata de darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. Su crédito lo destinará para la compra de pollo, papas, arroz y azúcar. El deseo de Yolanda es seguir prosperando en su negocio. El nuevo grupo “Mujeres trabajadoras” agradece a los inversionistas kiva por hacer posible éste crédito. Yolanda se encuentra parada en la parte posterior, es la primera del lado derecho y viste blusa negra.
texts.en: The“Mujeres trabajadoras” group is a new group of six working women ready to start working honestly. Yolanda is 43 years old. She is a widow and she has four children. One of her children is dependent on her. Currently, she sells food. She has had this business for more than seven years and it is going well. She tries very hard to give her children a better quality of life. Her loan will be used to purchase chicken, potatoes, rice and sugar. Yolanda wants to continue to thrive with her business. The new group called “Mujeres trabajadoras” is thankful to Kiva for making this loan possible. Yolanda is standing in the back, she is first on the right in the black shirt.

loans.use: purchase chicken, potatoes, rice and sugar.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en: Nasreen is a 40-year-old married woman who has been running a school for three years. She believes that giving children a good education provides the base on which success is built. She has worked hard to provide this strong foundation to the boys and girls in her community. After years of dedication, today there are 260 students in Nasreen's school. She requires a loan of PKR 100,000 to construct additional classrooms for her growing student body and to set up a computer lab for them. She wants to provide her students with the skills they need to succeed.

loans.use: to construct additional classrooms for her growing student body and to set up a computer lab for them.

loans.name: Pamela's Group

texts.en:
Pamela is 29 years old and is often described as a very hardworking individual. She has four children and is married. As a group leader, Pamela is representing her group of 13 farmers in Butere District in Kenya and is very excited to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

The decision to join One Acre Fund was largely a result of Pamela's desire to earn enough to feed her family. Apart from receiving farming inputs, she is also purchasing a solar light as part of her loan, which is very exciting to her as she will now be able to have an overall improved quality of life. With the profits that she gains from this year’s harvest, she plans to repair her home.

Pamela and her group will receive a total of 11 solar lights as well as input loans of maize and fertilizer to plant a total of 5.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Fredrick's Group

texts.en:
Fredrick is the group leader of his group in Butere District, and he is representing 12 farmers, including himself. He is married and a proud father of 2 children. Fredrick joined One Acre Fund for the first time this season, but he has been a farmer for 8 years.

Like many other farmers, Fredrick decided to work with One Acre Fund in order to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds. He hopes that by joining One Acre Fund and using the seeds and fertilizer he will get with this loan, he can join the ranks of One Acre Fund farmers that have doubled their harvest in their first year of the program. He plans to use the profits he earns from this year’s harvest to repair his home.

Fredrick's Group will use the farming inputs received with this loan to cultivate a total of 7.25 acres of land. They will also receive a total of 7 solar lights. Even though Fredrick decided not to, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light as part of their loan package.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students.

loans.name: Samat

texts.ru: Самат, 35 лет, женат, 2 дочери. У Самата среднее образование, с 2012 года он занимается животноводством и полеводством. Сегодня в хозяйстве есть 3 коровы, 2 овцы. Также на 6,0 Га земли выращивает пшеницу для реализации. Ежемесячный доход Самата составляет около 7,000 сомов (KGS). Он обратился в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS), на который купит семена клевера. Доходы от кредита позволят Самату увеличить его хозяйство и построить сараи для скота.
texts.en: Samat is 35 years old, married, with two daughters.  He has a secondary education and has been involved in animal husbandry and agriculture since 2012.  He currently has three cows and two sheep on his farm.  He also grows wheat for resale on six hectares of land.  He makes a monthly income of about 7,000 som (KGS).  He has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) which will help him to buy clover seeds.  The earnings from his loan will allow him to increase his farming business and to build a barn for his livestock.

loans.use: to buy clover seeds for land cultivation.

loans.name: Sabreen

texts.en:
Sabreen is a 35-year-old married woman from Jabalia city. She is a mother of two sons and two daughters. Four years ago, Sabreen started her business, which is a beauty salon. She loves her job and the demand for her work is high.

Sabreen took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new chair and mirrors for her beauty salon. This will improve her business and attract more clients.

Sabreen appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a new chair and mirrors for her beauty salon

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new tools and beauty products for her beauty salon

loans.name: Jose Eusebio

texts.es: José de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica al trabajo de albañilería y tiene 15 años de experiencia en la actividad, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de palas, baldes, cucharas y demás herramientas ya que las que actualmente tiene están bien deterioradas ya que con eso realiza su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: José is 53 years old and lives in his own house with his wife.  He works as a mason and has 15 years of experience in this career.  With what he earns from his job, he has been able to manage his household expenses.  He is requesting a loan to purchase buckets, shovels, spades and other tools since the ones he currently has are very worn and with these he carries out his job which generates a good income to give him a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase buckets, shovels, spades and other tools.

loans.name: Asuncion

texts.en:
Asuncion is 52 years old and married, with two children. 

Asuncion is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines.   She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Asuncion has been fattening pigs for 25 years now, and she has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain 
her efforts.

Asuncion would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell

loans.name: Farooq

texts.en: Farooq is a 46-year-old married woman. She has seven children. One of her daughters is also shown in the photo with the veil. For the past 10 years, she has been running a business of animal sales and purchase. She looks after the animals, such as goats and calves, and is responsible for feeding them and then sells them in different markets in the city. Currently, she has availed a Murabaha loan of 30,000 PKR to buy more animals for resale purposes. She is hopeful that expanding the business will help in improving her family’s living standards.

loans.use: to buy more animals for resale purposes.

loans.name: Samina

texts.en: Samina is a 34-year-old married mother of three children. For the past 10 years, she, along with her husband (also shown in the photo), has been running a business of buying and selling livestock. She looks after the animals and is responsible for feeding them while her husband sells them at different markets in the city. Their business is providing them with enough income to support their family. In order to expand her earnings, Samina has requested a Murabaha loan of 35,000 PKR to buy more animals, such as calves and heifers, for resale purposes. She is hopeful that expanding the business will help improve her family’s living standard.

loans.use: to buy more animals such as calves and heifers for resale purposes.

loans.name: Mulosharif

texts.ru:
Мулошариф мужчина 40 лет, жена, счастливый отец четверых детей. После окончания школы Мулошариф решил пойти работать, чтобы помочь родителям и прокормить своих сестер. На протяжении 3х лет он работал на стройке, планировал заработать и поступить в университет, но так и не получилось. В позрасте 25 лет он женился и начал занимать своим бизнесом. Он разводил домашний скот и также выращивал овощи и фрукты на своем участке земли и после продавал их на рынке. Сейчас у Мулошарифа в стаде 2 коровы и 5 баранов.Он бережно ухаживает за ними.
В настоящее время Мулошариф планирует расширить поголовье своего скота и купить одну корову и барана, также закупить овёс для животных, но у него нет полной суммы денег. Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за повторным  получением кредита. Он надеется, на долгое сотрудничество и благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en:
Mulosharif is 40 years old, married, and the happy father of four children.  After finishing school, he decided to look for a job, so that he could help his parents and feed his sisters.  For three years he worked in construction; he was planning to make some money and apply to university, but this didn't happen. He got married when he was 25 years old and started his own business.  He raised livestock and also grew fruits and vegetables on his own plot of land, then resold his produce at the market.  Today, Mulosharif has two cows and five sheep and he takes very good care of them.

At the moment, Mulosharif is planning to buy one cow and one sheep in order to expand his livestock headcount.  He also wants to buy oats for his animals, but he doesn't have the full amount of money necessary.  For this reason, he has turned to MDO Arvand for a second loan.  He is hoping for a long cooperation (with the microfinance institution), and he thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to increase his livestock headcount.

loans.name: Tasleem

texts.en:
Tasleem is 33 years old and married.  She is a mother of two children.

She has been in the business of selling cattle with the help of her husband (also in the photo) for the past seven years.  Her business has provided her family with a decent life.  She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food, and clothing. 

Currently she has asked Murabaha for 30,000 PKR to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market. She hopes that her business will generate greater revenue in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle for resale.

loans.name: Khalid

texts.en:
Khalid, who is 42 years old, has been running a school for many years.  He says he always wanted to start a school so that the children in his community could have access to good quality education, but he did not anticipate how much hard work was required. 

With hard work comes reward, however, and his motivation to see his students succeed is what keeps him going. There are now 300 students in his school, of whom half are girls. 

Khalid needs to buy more furniture and blackboards to accommodate his students and to build a new classroom. He is seeking a loan of PKR 100,000.

loans.use: to buy more furniture and blackboards and to build a new classroom.

loans.name: Noura

texts.en:
Noura is a 32-year-old married woman from a village near Nablus city. She is a mother of one small son. Four years ago, Noura started her business, which is a beauty salon. She loves her job and the demand for her work is high.

Noura took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy new tools and beauty products for her beauty salon. This will improve her business and attract more clients.

Noura appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy new tools and beauty products for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Aksana

texts.ru: Аксана, 37 лет, замужем, мать героиня 7 детей, самому младшему 2 года, старшему 17 лет. У Аксаны- среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, Аксана с 2000 года занимается животноводством, на сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве имеется 4 коровы, 50 овец, 2 лошади. Аксана обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят для откорма. Аксана является участником группы "Кетментобо", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 3 человека, всего их 4. Доходы от кредита Аксана планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Aksana is 37, married and the heroic mother of seven children. Her youngest is 2 and her oldest is 17. Aksana has a secondary education and has been raising livestock as the main source of income for her family since 2000. She currently has four cows, 50 sheep and two horses. Aksana applied for for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) with Bai Tushum Bank to buy calves for fattening. Aksana is a member of the Ketmentobo group, which consists of three other members. There are four members total. Aksana plans to use the earnings from the loan to invest in expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase calves for fattening and resale

loans.name: Damira

texts.ru: Дамира, 46 лет, есть сын. У Дамиры- среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она с 2007 года занимается животноводством и полеводством, на сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве есть 5 коров, 20 овец. На 0,60 Га земли она выращивает картофель и кукурузу. Ежемесячный доход - около 9,000 сом (KGS).  Дамира обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку ягнят для откорма. Дамира является одной из 4 участников группы "Кетментобо". Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Damira is 46 and has a son. She has a secondary education and has been raising livestock and planting crops as the main source of income for her family since 2007. She currently has five cows and 20 sheep. She also grows potatoes and corn on a 0.60 hectare plot of land and earns around 9,000 som (KGS) per month. Damira applied for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) with Bai Tushum Bank to buy lambs to fatten. She is one of four members of the Ketmentobo group. She plans to use the earnings from the loan to invest in expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy lambs in order to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es: María de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo quien le ayuda en el negocio, ella posee un molino de nixtamal y adicional a eso se dedica también vender antojitos, tiene mas de 12 años de tener su negocio el cual esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia,  ella esta solicitando un crédito para comprar cuchillas, fajas, discos, etc. y darle mantenimiento a sus molinos, para seguir con su trabajo y asi poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
María is 59 years old. She lives in a house that she owns with her son, who helps her with her business. She owns a nixtamal [boiled corn] grinder, and in addition to that, she also earns money selling prepared food. She has had her business for more than 12 years; it is located in her place of residence. 

María is requesting a loan in order to buy blades, belts, disks, etc., and to perform maintenance on her grinders so that she can continue with her work. That way, she will be able to have a better income.

loans.use: to buy blades, belts, disks, etc., and to perform maintenance on her grinders.

loans.name: Baktygul

texts.ru: Бактыгул, 51 год, замужем, мать героиня 7 детей. У Бактыгул - среднее образование, она знает, как правильно использовать и планировать денежные средства для достижения поставленных целей. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, Бактыгул с 2005 года занимается животноводством и полеводством, на сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве имеется 4 коровы, 28 овец, также есть 1,25 ГА собственной земли, где Бактыгул выращивает картофель и кукурузу. Бактыгул решила обратиться в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят для откорма. Бактыгул является лидером группы "Кетментобо", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 3 человека, всего их 4. Доходы от кредита Бактыгул планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Baktygul is 51, married, and the mother of seven children. She has a secondary education and understands how to use and strategize financial resources to achieve her goals. She has been raising livestock and planting crops as the main source of income for her family since 2005. She currently has four cows, 28 sheep and a 1.25 hectare plot of land where she grows potatoes and corn. Baktygul decided to apply for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) with Bai Tushum Bank to buy calves for fattening. Baktygul is the leader of the Ketmentobo group, which consists of three other people. There are four members total. Baktygul plans to use the earnings from the loan to invest in the continuing expansion of her business.

loans.use: to buy calves for fattening and resale

loans.name: Ulanbu

texts.ru: Уланбу, 44 года, замужем, мать 4 детей. У Уланбу- среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она с 2008 года занимается животноводством и полеводством, на сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве имеется 2 коровы, 25 овец. Уланбу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для откорма. Уланбу является одной из 4 участников группы "Кетментобо". Доходы от кредита Уланбу планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Ulanbu is 44, married and the mother of four children. She has a secondary education and has been raising livestock and planting crops as the main source of income for her family since 2008. She currently has two cows and 25 sheep. Ulanbu applied for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) with Bai Tushum Bank to buy sheep to fatten. Ulanbu is one of four members of the Ketmentobo group. She plans to use the earnings from the loan to invest in expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sheep in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Balqees

texts.en: Balqees is 41 years old and a married woman. The man shown in the photo is Balqees’s husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Balqees has applied for a loan of 45,000 PKR for her husband. He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Balqees is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Mariama

texts.fr: Mariama est une femme mariée et âgée de 58 ans. Mariama vit à Adidogomé pour entreprendre ses activités. Pour assurer ses charges et faire face à ses besoins, Mariama vend des chouchoux pour cheveux afin de gagner son revenu. Mariama s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Pour mieux réaliser son activité, Mariama désire acheter des chouchoux et nécessite ce crédit pour accomplir son objectif et faire plus de bénéfice.
texts.en: Mariama is a married woman, 58 years old, who lives in Adidogomé to operate her business. To cover her expenses and to cope, she sells scrunchies for hair in order to earn an income. She gets her supplies once a month at the market. For better business, Mariama would like to purchase some scrunchies and has need of this loan to accomplish her goal and to make more profit.

loans.use: to purchase 233 units of scrunchies

loans.name: Orlin Alfredo

texts.es: Orlin, tiene 24 años de edad, esta soltero, reside en una aldea del municipio de Gracias, Lempira con su familia. Desde hace 10 años, se dedica a la agricultura, cultivando café. Este café lo vende a los intermediarios de la zona y logra obtener sus propios ingresos. Con el fin de mantener su finca en buen estado ha decidido solicitar un préstamo  por la cantidad de 10,000 lempiras, para comprar abonos y fertilizantes para darle asistencia a su finca y sembrar mas plantas de café. Su plan es ampliar el cultivo y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Orlin is 24 years old, single, and lives in a village in the county of Gracias, Lempira with his family.  For the past 10 years, he has worked in agriculture, cultivativing coffee.  He sells this coffee to intermediaries in the region and earns his own income.  With the goal of maintaining his farm in good shape, he has decided to request a loan for 10,000 lempiras to purchase compost and fertilizers to assist his farm and to plant more coffee plants.  His plan is to increase his harvest and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase compost and fertilizers to assist his farm and to plant more coffee plants.

loans.name: Elise

texts.fr: Mariée, Elise est une femme de 34 ans qui vit à Adidogomé avec ses trois enfants. Pour vivre et venir en aide aux besoins de ses enfants, Elise vend des  charbons de bois dans son quartier et trouve son revenu grâce à ce commerce. Elise s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Elise désire ce microcrédit pour acheter des sacs de charbons de bois afin de trouver le bénéfice pour favoriser l’éducation de ses enfants et  générer assez de revenus.
texts.en: Elise is a married woman, 34 years old, who lives in Adidogomé with her three children. For a living and to help out her children, she sells charcoal in her district and is earning an income, thanks to this commerce. She gets her supplies once a month at the market. Elise would like this micro-loan to purchase sacks of charcoal to earn a profit for her children’s education and for generating enough revenues.

loans.use: to purchase 40 sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Martha Lidia

texts.es: Martha de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cuatro hijos, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tamales gallina y pisques, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 10 años vende de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su casa y tiene muchos clientes ya establecidos, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz, gallinas, verduras y demás ingredientes para poder continuar con sus ventas y así poder tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con sus hijos.
texts.en:
